name: Tsugite
description:
Tsugite is the Japanese art of woodworking. Inspired by the art of making wooden joints without screws or nails this puzzle game allows you to see if you have what it takes to be a real craftsmen.

Carve the last piece by clicking on it until it fits together with the rest of the pieces.

Click and drag to move the camera, scroll to zoom.

Feel free to share interesting level codes in the comments! It can be seen on the bottom left during gameplay.
